short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to mute Twitch when ads play!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to mute Twitch when ads play! Uses a MutationObserver to observe when changes are made to the ad-overlay component and clicks the mute button when ads play and the unmute button when they stop.
https://github.com/amastov/ToMute
